column1: Image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of the MRI, showing the head of a man of 37 years old of sagittal section. Slice n°119 is observed starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The following elements are present : the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3194.3848 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 6284.6191 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 371.7773 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 321.6797 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1684.8633 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 436.3770 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 60.6445 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1025.6836 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 59.3262 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 246.5332 mm³.
